short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free browser extension alerts you to scams and suspicious activity in your Twitter feed and website surfing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay secure while browsing with SafeSoul, a free browser extension designed to enhance your online safety. Integrated into Twitter, SafeSoul provides real-time security alerts to protect you from scams and suspicious activities in your feed.

With SafeSoul, you can instantly perform safety checks on any open page, including projects on OS and potentially scammed websites. Our extension displays live security status for profiles and websites, keeping you informed and protected.

To start using the extension install it to your browser and log in with your wallet address. SafeSoul is currently available in its beta version through the SafeSoul for Builders program. If you're a founder or core member of the Web3 community, apply to join the program on our website! As a participant, you'll gain early access to the extension and contribute to the ongoing development of SafeSoul.
